definitions.definition: A small toy sold in a plastic capsule in a vending machine , especially toys sold in or associated with Japan .
The vending machine that sells such toys.
( video games ) A mechanism in certain video games , especially mobile games , whereby in-game items or characters are purchased randomly with real or in-game money.
( video games ) A game which features this mechanic as its central feature.

main_definition: A small toy sold in a plastic capsule in a vending machine , especially toys sold in or associated with Japan .
secondary_definitions: The vending machine that sells such toys.
( video games ) A mechanism in certain video games , especially mobile games , whereby in-game items or characters are purchased randomly with real or in-game money.
( video games ) A game which features this mechanic as its central feature.

definitions.definition: A village -level administrative division in Inner Mongolia .

main_definition: A village -level administrative division in Inner Mongolia .
